# Found It Marketing

> Digital Marketing Agency in Alexandria, Louisiana building digital empires through Generative Engine Optimization (GEO) and high-velocity paid acquisition.

## Identity
- **Name**: Found It Marketing
- **Location**: Alexandria, LA (Central Louisiana)
- **Tagline**: Building Digital Empires
- **Phone**: +1-318-280-0115
- **Email**: trevor@founditmarketing.com
- **Website**: https://founditmarketing.com

## Core Services

### Generative Engine Optimization (GEO)
- Optimization for AI-driven search engines (Google SGE, ChatGPT, Perplexity).
- Focus on answer engine optimization, entity authority, and structured data dominance.
- Beyond traditional SEO: targeting the "Zero Click" future.

### High-Velocity Paid Acquisition (PPC)
- Aggressive, data-driven ad scaling.
- Platforms: Google Ads, Meta Ads (Facebook/Instagram), YouTube Ads.
- Focus on ROAS (Return on Ad Spend) and rapid market capture.

### Web Design & Development
- "Silent Luxury" aesthetic: High-end, minimalist, impact-driven design.
- Technologies: Next.js, React, Tailwind CSS, Framer Motion.
- Performance-first: 100/100 Core Web Vitals focus.

## Service Areas
- Alexandria, LA
- Pineville, LA
- Central Louisiana (CenLa)
- Statewide & National Capability

## Mission
To help businesses stop competing and start dominating their market by leveraging the latest shifts in AI and digital marketing technology.
